campaign.name: $$20623$$Fall of the Trident
campaign.scenario: $$20624$$Athena comes to Arkantos in a dream to set him on his quest.
$$20625$$Arkantos sails in to Atlantis. Krakens and pirates attack. You and your men must defend Atlantis at all costs. ui\scenario overlay 1
The krakens and pirates are defeated and retreating, but Posiedons trident has been taken.
$$20626$$You and your men will make Kamos pay for stealing the trident. ui\scenario overlay 1 ui\scenario overlay 2
Kamos escapes on a Kraken.
$$20627$$Break through Troys outer defenses.
$$20628$$The Greeks and their Atlantean allies are prepared to lay siege the mighty Trojan gate.
$$20629$$Troy counter attacks Ajax and his men. You and your men must rescue Ajax and regain control.
Troy has surprised Agamemnon while Arkantos saved Ajax.
$$20630$$Secretly build a Trojan Horse and prepare it to be taken inside the Troy walls. Once inside, open the gates and destroy the Trojan empire.
Troy is in flames.
While Gargarensis looks over a dig to the underworld, Kemsyt gives him a report.
$$20631$$Loklos is in trouble, push back the opposition and free Chiron.
We meet Chiron the Centaur Hero.
$$20632$$Forces are split. Move them individually and take the underworld entrance.
Gargarensis calls on the gods to rain terror and escapes to the underworld.
$$20633$$Destroy the great ram Gargarensis is using to open the Hades gate.
Gargarensis traps Arkantos and his men in the underworld.
$$20634$$With the help of undead souls, you must escape the underworld.
The Gods provide a safe passage out of Erebus.
Gargarensis and Kamos discuss further plans.
$$20635$$After meeting Amanra, you and your men must defend and dig out the Guardians sword.
$$20636$$You and your men must bring the sword to the Guardian, then use the Guardian and capture an Osiris piece.
$$20637$$You and your men are ambushed and must not let the Osiris piece be captured.
$$20638$$You must use Amanra to rescue the other warriors from an Egyptian prison.
Amanra shows up just in time to run off Gargarensis and free Arkantos and Ajax.
$$20639$$You must rescue the rest of your men from the prison and get out of Alexandria with an Osiris part.
